items.sentence: It took Tom three years to write this novel.
I'm pretty sure that's not why Tom did that.
I wonder why Tom is so reluctant to do that.
I wonder why Tom is so desperate to do that.
I wish Tom hadn't waited so long to do that.
I went to Tom's office, but he wasn't there.
I want to know if Tom needs to do that, too.
I understand why Tom didn't want to do that.
How often does Tom eat dinner at your house?
Do you really think Tom will home on Monday?
Do you mean you didn't go swimming with Tom?
Three women are waiting for you at the gate.
I speak French as well as anybody else here.
I lived in Boston before I moved to Chicago.
I learned to ride a bicycle three years ago.
Tom wasn't the only person who was arrested.
Tom wasn't the only one who knew about that.
Tom wasn't the first person to tell me that.
Tom wasn't the first one to get off the bus.
Didn't Tom tell you what he wanted to drink?
